sentences.en: Children who have a positive self-image are less likely to present behaviour and discipline problems.
sentences.cn: 有着正面自我形象的儿童较不可能出现行为和纪律的问题。

sentences.en: The way in which you identify yourself is the best reflection of your self-image.
sentences.cn: 你认识自己的方式是你的自我形象的最佳反映。

sentences.en: Self-image is more than how you picture yourself; it also involves how others see you.
sentences.cn: 自我形象不仅仅是你如何评价自己，还包括别人如何看待你。
